title: Media Producer | Video Editor | Cinematography | Musician
intro: I create story-driven media that blends visual storytelling, sound design, and pacing to immerse audiences. My work spans narrative film, documentary, experimental media, and music-driven content—supporting projects from planning and shooting to editing and final delivery.

capstone.title: Capstone Media Theses Production
capstone.description:
Capstone Media Theses Production is an experimental short film exploring the psychological experience of dissociation through repetition, uncanny imagery, and distorted sound design. Rather than relying on a traditional three-act narrative, the project immerses the audience in the sensation of derealization—blurring the line between reality and dreamlike perception.

As part of the production team, I assisted in the creative and technical execution of the film, contributing to editing, visual continuity, and sound-driven storytelling. The project emphasizes sensory experience over exposition, using minimal dialogue, abnormal visuals, and layered audio to evoke feelings of disorientation, isolation, and emotional detachment. The goal is not to explain dissociation, but to make the audience feel it viscerally.

This production was developed for professional evaluation and reflects capstone-level expectations in planning, production workflow, and post-production execution.

music.headline: Music & Audio Work
music.body: Music is a core part of my creative identity and influences how I edit, pace visuals, and build atmosphere through sound. I produce and release music under the artist name Dr. Blackout, and I apply the same audio sensitivity to film and video work.

core: Video Editing: narrative structure, pacing, transitions, exports
Cinematography: framing, composition, camera movement, lighting fundamentals
Audio & Sound: dialogue cleanup, ambient sound design, music integration
Production Workflow: shot planning, coverage, scheduling, collaboration
Storytelling: mood creation, experimental formats, visual narrative
